channel.title: NYS:GPC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:GPC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Genuine Parts Weighs Separation of Auto Business
item.description: Genuine Parts Co., an industrials company that recently settled with activist investor Elliott Investment Management, is considering a breakup, people familiar with the matter said.
